summary: Created E2E test for spec 01-project-setup that verifies dev server starts, app loads correctly, page title contains 'Lightning', meta configuration is correct, and Tailwind CSS styles are applied. All tests include console error capture to ensure no JavaScript errors during load.
flows_tested: Dev server starts and app loads successfully with correct heading
Page has correct meta configuration (title, viewport, description)
Tailwind CSS styles are properly applied (min-h-screen, bg-slate-50)
